cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on April 6, 2022
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 6376, Student Veteran Work Study Modernization Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 8 (Wednesday, January 12, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mrs. AXNE:
H.R. 6376.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I Section 8 of the United States Constitution
[Page H78]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

title: Student Veteran Work Study Modernization Act
